mapper.select: select user_id, user_account, user_password, is_shop, user_name from auction_user, auction_user_info where user_account = #{account} and auction_user.user_id = auction_user_info.user_id
select user_id, user_name, user_credential_type, user_credential_num, user_sex, user_birth, user_age, user_registered_date from auction_user_info where user_id = #{modelId}
mapper.update: update auction_user_info set user_name = #{model.userName}, user_credential_type = #{model.userCredentialType}, user_credential_num = #{model.userCredentialNum}, user_sex = #{model.userSex}, user_birth = #{model.userBirth} where user_id = #{model.userId}
mapper.insert: insert into auction_user (user_account, user_password, is_shop) value (#{model.userAccount}, #{model.userPassword}, #{model.isShop})

insert into auction_user_info (user_id, user_name, user_credential_type, user_credential_num, user_sex, user_birth, user_account_year) value (#{model.userId}, #{model.userName}, #{model.userCredentialType}, #{model.userCredentialNum}, #{model.userSex}, #{model.userBirth})
